dataObject.content: Strava, which tracks the sports activity trends of some 50 million people in almost 200 countries, surveyed 25,000 runners and found that half of them say they either hate it or barely tolerate it, while only 8% love it.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Unbiased"},"rationale":"Appears just to be stating data which is inherently unbiased."}

{"category":{"label":"Unbiased"},"rationale":"The people surveyed might be biased, i.e. stating that they love or hate something, but the actual statement about the runners isn't, since it's just reporting on their opinions."}
